title: 2020-09-17 - Ransomware’s New Trend- Exfiltration and Extortion
plain_text:
# Ransomware's New Trend: Exfiltration and Extortion

**[crypsisgroup.com/insights/ransomwares-new-trend-exfiltration-and-extortion](https://www.crypsisgroup.com/insights/ransomwares-new-trend-exfiltration-and-extortion)**

Dec 16, 2020 at 10:48 AM


asset thumbnail


White Paper

Ransomware is evolving. In this analysis, the Unit 42 team explores the trend of data
exfiltration during ransomware attacks, the anatomy of this type of attack, commonly
associated Techniques, Tactics, and Procedures (TTPs), and best practices to defend
against them.

Download


-----
